price: Reci robovima Mojim da govore samo lijepe riječi jer bi šejtan mogao posijati neprijateljstvo među njima, šejtan je, doista, čovjekov otvoreni neprijatelj.
arabic: وَقُل لِّعِبَادِي يَقُولُواْ ٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُۚ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ يَنزَغُ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ عَدُوّٗا مُّبِينٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqul liʿibādī yaqūlū allatī hiya aḥsanu inna al-shayṭāna yanzaghu baynahum inna al-shayṭāna kāna lil'insāni ʿaduwwan mubīnan
